articles.author: Barney Calman
articles.title: NHS rejects ketamine for depression as psychiatrists accuse NICE of mental health discrimination - Daily Mail
articles.description: Spravato (pictured), a nasal spray also known as esketamine, got the green light from the European Medicines Agency in December 2019 as a fast-acting treatment for depression sufferers.
articles.content:
A row has broken out between NHS spending watchdogs and top mental health doctors over approval of a controversial ketamine-based antidepressant.

articles.title: Recapping and mite removal behaviour in Cuba: home to the world's largest population of Varroa-resistant European honeybees | Scientific Reports - Nature.com
articles.description: Scientific Reports - Recapping and mite removal behaviour in Cuba: home to the world’s largest population of Varroa-resistant European honeybees
articles.content: We confirm that Cuba is home to the worlds largest European honeybee population that has naturally become Varroa-resistant, with an estimated 220,000 colonies being maintained without any form of che… [+9302 chars]
